title: Melkizedek Otim
text:
Melkizedek Otim (1935-2019) was an <a href="Anglican">Anglican</a> <a href="bishop">bishop</a> in <a href="Church%20of%20Uganda">Uganda</a>: he was <a href="Diocese%20of%20Lango">Bishop of Lango</a> from 1976 until 2001.
Otim was educated at <a href="Uganda%20Christian%20University">Uganda Christian University</a> and <a href="ordained">ordained</a> <a href="deacon">deacon</a> in 1967 and <a href="priest">priest</a> in 1979. He served the <a href="Bishop%20of%20Northern%20Uganda">Diocese of Northern Uganda</a> until his elevation to the episcopate.
